CustomField.formula: TEXT(StartDate__c)+'_'+ IF(ISBLANK(SalesOrg__c ), '', SalesOrg__c+'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(harvest__c ), '', harvest__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Currency__c)), '', TEXT(Currency__c)+'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( SalesCondition__c ), '', SalesCondition__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( ProductGroup__c ), '', ProductGroup__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( SalesOffice__c ), '', SalesOffice__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( Culture__c ), '', Culture__c +'_')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(ClientGroup__c, "" ), '', TEXT(ClientGroup__c) +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(Account__c ), '', Account__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(SalesTeam__c ), '', SalesTeam__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(Product__c ), '', Product__c+'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(RecordTypeId ), '', RecordTypeId)
CustomField.label: Descrição Externald
